Text:
I love the movie. Will keep it on my HD as long as I can...
About the quality: it's OK (3170 Kbps Avg. Bitrate). The movie itself is not very long so the size is only 2,7GB. Plus, there is no other audio tracks apart from the original, English; no subtitles; no extras; menu is very basic.

Hi Elynitthria,

Possible to download files I'm missing from this movie or do I have to download the whole film again?

Appreciate your response.
